website_summaries.verdict: Rose gold-tone watch with minimalist white 40-millimeter dial featuring two hands and stick hour markers.
pros: Classic design in this attractive and very affordable watch
Durable stainless steel case, waterproof cover, and soft, comfortable nylon strap
cons: Some complaints about battery life and water resistance

customer_reviews.title: A great DW styled watch.
customer_reviews.text: I love this no frills, simple watch and I have received many compliments. Who knew a little $15 watch would be some nice. If you're looking for a DW style watch without having to shell out DW brand money, this is the watch for you. The Nato strap is very comfortable. The case is very slim. The lugs (where the case and strap connects) are very durable. I hit it on a banister pretty hard, the other day, right on one of the lugs, in the 'sweet-spot', with no damage. The crystal doesn't have any scratches and I'm very rough on watches. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and the case thickness at just 0
customer_reviews.text: Although I own several watches, I find myself wearing this watch on a daily basis, whether I dress formally or wear shorts, this inexpensive watch has won me over. Very stylish, comfortable and the case thickness at just 0.6 CM is one of the best watches I've owned at a fraction of the cost I've paid for other bulkier, less stylish watches I've purchased. If you're sitting on the fence on this watch, go for it, you won't regret it both in price and style.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: cool watch that goes with so many outfits because it ...
customer_reviews.text: cool watch that goes with so many outfits because it isn't a formal watch band. I needed a watch to wear to work since I work in a print shop. I do not like the plastic running watches but didn't want to wear a nice watch to work. this is the perfect blend and I really like it! and if/when I break it at work, no worries, I'll but a new one cause it's only $15!
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, love the aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: This watch is super cute! I have notoriously child-sized wrists, and was expecting to have to replace the watchband when it came, but I was pleasantly surprised when it fit my wrist on the third-to-last hole! I guess I wasn’t anticipating the size of the watch face, because it covers the entirety of my wrist and kind of sticks out, but I’m just so excited to wear it out that I don’t think I mind! It was super easy to set to the correct time
customer_reviews.author: RonniBonni

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch and the especially the band, more so than standard leather bands. Only downsides it had is it broke due to cold weather exposure. Not the most durable watch so dont be too harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin A.

customer_reviews.title: This a great looking, inexpensive watch
customer_reviews.text: This a great looking, inexpensive watch. It looks to cost far more than it does. The shipping was fast. It looks so nice that I purchased the Ritche 4PC 20mm Nato Straps to go with it. The straps allow me to easily change the color of the band for different looks. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A.

customer_reviews.title: Hoping the seller reads this review.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the watch. Fits great, awesome quality, only downside is the battery did not work when it arrived. I’d hate to return such an awesome watch for just the battery not working. Is there anyway I could exchange for one with a working battery. If not what are my options?
customer_reviews.author: Angel G.

customer_reviews.title: Got Time?
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months the battery is still going strong. Really good feel on the wrist. The fabric that the strap is made out of gets a bit itchy after a while but nothing to extreme. People do compliment the watch but they also like the color its so bright and looks good on both male and females. Great buy or Great gift even.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It's Cool
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice watch and it's comfortable but I didn't like how the face was kinda big for the strap and the watch has no second hand. I like having my watches be really accurate and seeing how many seconds I have left till the next minute but this doesn't have it. However for the price its worth a buy to add to a collection.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon A.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps time just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Threw a leather, single strap on this watch and it looks very fly for how cheap it was. Keeps time just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied second time customer
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely love this product, and this will be my second time picking it up (the original ended up as a gift for a patient). The simple design is lovely, and I very much like how it is reliable and fits most everyday tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Arman Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: otherwise I am very satisfied, elegant looking watch
customer_reviews.text: The reason that I am giving a five star is because the band looks small for my big hands ....otherwise I am very satisfied, elegant looking watch. I will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't ticking when i got it, but very understanding seller
customer_reviews.text: Was not working when I received it. Boyfriend's Father's Day gift, kinda disappointed. After contacting seller, they were very understanding and even got me another that was functioning! Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Shevika C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch for the price, truly classic looking. However the watch band was not what I though it would be (in looks) so I did replace it with a black silicon band and it looks very good. All in all a very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery.
customer_reviews.text: Dead battery! Unbelievable. Looks beautiful. This was my 2nd time purchasing the watch, but from a different seller. First time, watch was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, feels good, it’s affordable and it came fast (pause). It fits very well. I'm 180LB and 5’9 and It fits very good on my wrist. I recommend the hell out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing. I have one expensive watch from Movado
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing. I have one expensive watch from Movado, obviously that was a gift to me. But this watch is just as nice, I normally wear to make my outfits pop, add a little accessory here or there.
customer_reviews.author: Urian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This watch has everything to be liked...looks...band...weight...accuracy -so far-...PRICE...it's a winner. Happy Camper
customer_reviews.author: Andre de Toledo

customer_reviews.title: Win-Win.  You can't really lose at the price point.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my sons 18th birthday, in his words "Mom, I received a lot of compliments on this watch today!" I also bought him an all navy band but the red/blue has been the real stunner.
customer_reviews.author: TNelly

customer_reviews.title: Try it !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch and what a value !! People think it's high end !! It is lightweight and comfortable, a gorgeous u s watch !
customer_reviews.author: Likes 2 read

customer_reviews.title: Good watch with a good price
customer_reviews.text: Impressive watch for the price. I have no complaints, got exactly what I expected with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Out the box it didnt work and looked really cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice minimal watch
customer_reviews.text: Really nice minimal Daniel Wellington style watch for a fraction of the price. Happy with how it looks and no problems so far on functionality. A clean, minimal watch.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Beautifulwatch with a ghetto clasp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch with a ghetto clasp. My clasp might just be broken. Want to love this watch, but I feel like it'll break off with this janky clasp in less than a week. If I paid anymore than $17, I would've given this a 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect watch. At first I thought it wasn’t working bc I doesn’t have a seconds hand but it works perfectly. The ability to change your straps is fun as well.
customer_reviews.author: Will banks

customer_reviews.title: Esthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sleek watch that pairs will with a casual look or slightly dressier. For the price you can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual look
customer_reviews.text: Very clean casual look. Goes perfect with my Nautica sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Zavian

customer_reviews.title: I like to wear this to work with my shirt and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear this to work with my shirt and tie.. I've gotten a lot of compliments since I started wearing this watch.
customer_reviews.author: RicoJM9

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price for a quality watch. I've had it for a few weeks now and it's showing no signs of wear. Stylish and functional. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking, very clean and attractive face. Very, very nice. Looks like a much more costly watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Dope time piece.....im happy
customer_reviews.text: Badass piece. Looks clean af. Pricey looking too. Good quality watch.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Screw it.
customer_reviews.text: My friends hate it, but I guess I can get over that.
customer_reviews.author: Brandan

customer_reviews.title: Good looking face
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile, can go with a bunch of different looks. Good looking face, simple.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mahan

customer_reviews.title: elegant
customer_reviews.text: it’s a nice, elegant, slim watch for the money. tbh i really like it and although i have other watches too i make sure to wear this one every week
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good looking and a very good price. What's not to like here?
customer_reviews.author: Smiley888

customer_reviews.title: Designers loved this fashion statement!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Works great, keeps the time, and friends and coworkers notice and compliment it often.
customer_reviews.author: Bretticus

customer_reviews.title: Whad you'd expect from a watch. Shows the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Whad you'd expect from a watch. Shows the time, it's true to color, took it in the swimming pool, still works.. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Verma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch lots of style . Great looking looks nice with my collection
customer_reviews.author: Cj Feinauer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this watch!!! It’s so cute and came in this neat box.
customer_reviews.author: Shameika Ejiasi

customer_reviews.title: ... receive my watch it didn't hit me on how nice this watch was until I kept gettin comment on ...
customer_reviews.text: When I receive my watch it didn't hit me on how nice this watch was until I kept gettin comment on how nice my watch is ,made me take a second look on my great purchase now I wear it all the time .
customer_reviews.author: john alexander

customer_reviews.title: It's such a quality piece and an amazing bargin!
customer_reviews.text: I paired this $15 CakCity watch in gold with a $10.50 iStrap gold deployment clasp and a $34.95 Clockwork Synergy red vintage leather watch strap from their Dapper collection. Each of these available at Amazon currently at the prices I've stated. It's now one of my favorite watches among my twenty plus collection of much greater value. It looks great and keeps perfect time. It's such a good quality piece and an amazing bargain. The watch strap is silky soft and supple, high quality leather and shows that, which adds to the image and feel of this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool watch when you want to switch things up a little. I've worn it a few times and received nice compliments.
customer_reviews.author: AllTruMan

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money . Cheaper to buy this than to get a new band for an existing watch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, feels like decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Slim line on the wrist, comfortable, feels like decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: simple and lovely! gets the job done especially with the price! doesn't feel cheap to me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, looks nice in person
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, works well, comfortable, just somewhat of a bulge you’re left over with on the side
customer_reviews.author: David Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great light and strong watch and also  Looks great..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch light and strong looks great... the band is bright and colorful... thx
customer_reviews.author: JAY - FLA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch for the money, nice quality. Strap is easily replaceable at any time. Easy to wear. Thin watch.
customer_reviews.author: Moh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!, easy to read, great looking, doesn't get better than that!
customer_reviews.author: tina b. bromley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything I received was (or is)excellent...Very impressed by the quality....
customer_reviews.author: John Gunning

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great liking watch. Fits great doesn't feel cheap, can't tell the difference between this and $100 competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and functioning watch! Seems fairly durable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the Watch is okay, then the watch belt is a little long to fit for my slender wrist
customer_reviews.author: kim youngjin

customer_reviews.title: 100% happy
customer_reviews.text: This is really good looking. Everyone is liking it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rashed

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchases so far six watches for brothers and nephews. They all like them very much. It is affordable and claasy.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Though the watch looks good
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Though the watch looks good, I received it without a proper box, description or warranty! It cannot be an appropriate gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sumanth

customer_reviews.title: Keep away from ANY amount of water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch with high hopes. I was washing my hands in the bathroom and the smallest amount of water sprayed over the supposedly water resistant watch and it went in! Like literally went in the watch and fogged up the glass. Embarrassing and a waste of $16.
customer_reviews.author: kianoosh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Maxi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased the watch was better than expected
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Asked for the time. It told me. I knew the time but wanted to make sure. It was like 11:21 if I remember correctly. I might ask for the time again who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No second hand.
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect that it has no second hand. Though now I see the picture did not show one. I just never expected an analog watch not to have a second hand. I think this ought to be pointed out in the text. Also the watch should be shown in profile on a wrist so you can judge how slim or not it is. It does appear slim in the profile shown but the back part projects the watch up a bit, which is not a problem. Watch band is good and would be reusable on other watches.
customer_reviews.author: CTF 500

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This watch has so much style to it I love it. It's classy and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PLAYING FOR TIME
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. This is my second one I bought from this company this month.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: the quality is good looks nice on my wrist
customer_reviews.text: comparing ti it's price : the quality is good looks nice on my wrist
customer_reviews.author: alisalem

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased to say that the watch met every expectation that ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the watch about about a month ago, wasnt sure what to expect with it being a mere $15, but my hopes werent exactly high. I am pleased to say that the watch met every expectation that I had, and more. Its a very good looking watch, looks much more expensive than it actually is, and I've gotten numerous compliments on it. I currently use it as my daily watch, and I am highly satisfied. I would recommend it if youre looking for a cheap, good-looking alternative to some of the more expensive watches on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Dead as a doornail after seven weeks! I bought this watch in the middle of April, and by the first week of July it had stopped working. I can't say I was surprised, given the price. I just decided to take a chance on it because it was inexpensive. I guess you get what you pay for and even less! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: BALFOUR

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Comfortable and nice. Accidentally forgot to take it off in shower once and it held up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and have enjoyed it, but it just stopped working - the ...
customer_reviews.text: I write the following message to the seller - we will see what happens: Hi, I bought this about 1 month ago, and have enjoyed it, but it just stopped working - the battery must have died? Is there any sort of warranty or way I could return or exchange it? It's not right that I should pay for a watch who's battery just stops after 4-5 weeks. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JR Becker

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. I've received a number of compliments about it. My only complaint is that the watchband is weird. The way it's built, you have a long end that sticks out with no "sleeve" or loop in which to tuck it. Kinda bulky.
customer_reviews.author: InDaKnow

customer_reviews.title: This watch is awesome
customer_reviews.text: The price for this product is unreal. The nylon strap is comfortable, strong, and classy. The watch itself is thin with a beautiful clear glass. I highly recommend anyone to get this watch. I received the watch in 2-3 days, which was really convenient. I'd give this review 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The watch came lose after the first time wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dropped from a small height onto a wooden floor and ...
customer_reviews.text: Dropped from a small height onto a wooden floor and all the numbers/lines fell off inside the watch. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Muir

customer_reviews.title: looks fantastic. However
customer_reviews.text: Overall, looks fantastic. However, the straps are not adjustable, so the end sticks out if you have skinny wrists like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not even right twice a day
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box the time is wrong. When the hour hand points at 12, the minute hand points at 6! It boggles the mind. Is there a way to fix that? It appears that the hour hand is off by 30 minutes relative to the minute hand. Otherwise appears work.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

product_meta.title: Mens Watch Ultra Thin Wrist Watches for Men Fashion Waterproof Dress Nylon Band
product_meta.description:
Highlights:
- Imported Quartz Movement: provide precise and accurate time keeping
- Roman Number Time Mark
- Classic Business Casual Design. Combines quality, leading edge fashion, and value.
- Stainless Steel Dial Case Back Cover
- Calendar Date Window
- 98FT / 30M Normal Water Resistant: Handwash, swimming, daily use waterproof, not suitable for underwater activities - such as diving. Too much water contact WILL DAMAGE THE LEATHER BAND STRAP.

Features
- Roman Number Time Mark
- Calendar Date

Material:
- Case Material: Stainless Steel
- Band Material: Leather
- Mirror Surface: Mineral Glass

Specification:
- Dial Color: White
- Dial Case Diameter: 1.6 inch / 4 cm
- Dial Case Thickness: 0.6 inch / 1.6 cm
- Band Color: Brown
- Band width: 0.8 inch / 2 cm
- Total Length: 9.45 inch / 24 cm
- Max Perimeter 8.66 inch / 22 cm (Buckle to Hole)
- Band Clasp Type: Buckle
- Watch Weight: 3.5 oz / 98 g




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :4.4 x 3.9 x 2.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 CR2 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :June 20, 2018
 * Manufacturer :CakCity
 * ASIN :B07DVFVDRP

    *  #144542 inMen's Shops

feature_bullets: Rose gold-tone watch with minimalist white dial featuring slender stick hour markers, baton-shape hands

Classic Design: the classic style was carefully designed to stand the test of time while maintaining its effortless beauty. This minimalistic piece proves that simple does not necessarily mean boring.
Durable: stainless steel water proof case cover, soft nylon strap provide comfortable wearing experience.
Convenient and comfortable: Stainless steel clasp, free buckle, easy to put on or take off.
Water resistant to 30 m (99 ft): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming.
